statements: SELECT * FROM performance_metrics
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id = 1
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE time_period_end < '2022-01-01'
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, time_period_start, value FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY time_period_start DESC
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, time_period_start, time_period_end, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE time_period_start >= '2022-01-01' AND time_period_end <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM performance_metrics WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT metric_name, value, time_period_start, time_period_end FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%sales%' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id IN (2, 4, 6) AND time_period_start <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY time_period_start ASC, value DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT id, metric_name, time_period FROM performance_metrics WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM benchmark_results WHERE result_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY execution_time ASC;
SELECT benchmark_name, time_started, time_completed FROM benchmark_results WHERE time_started BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Usage';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM benchmark_results WHERE execution_time < 10 ORDER BY time_started DESC;
SELECT benchmark_name, execution_time FROM benchmark_results WHERE time_started BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING average_value > 30;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM time_periods WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, time_period FROM performance_metrics JOIN benchmark_results ON performance_metrics.metric_id = benchmark_results.metric_id;
SELECT benchmark_results.result_value, time_periods.period_name FROM benchmark_results JOIN time_periods ON benchmark_results.period_id = time_periods.period_id WHERE result_value < 5000;

SELECT performance_metrics.metric_name, performance_metrics.metric_value, time_periods.start_date FROM performance_metrics INNER JOIN time_periods ON performance_metrics.time_period = time_periods.start_date
SELECT * FROM benchmark_results WHERE result_value > 100
SELECT performance_metrics.*, time_periods.* FROM performance_metrics, time_periods
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM benchmark_results
SELECT performance_metrics.metric_name AS metric FROM performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM time_periods ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, time_period FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Usage';
SELECT comparison_id, metric_id_1, metric_id_2, comparison_result FROM comparisons WHERE comparison_result = 'Success';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%response%' ORDER BY time_period DESC, metric_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT metric_name, SUM(metric_value) AS total_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY metric_name ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT p.metric_name, t.start_date, t.end_date FROM performance_metrics p JOIN time_periods t ON p.time_period = t.time_period_id WHERE p.metric_value > 100 ORDER BY t.start_date ASC;

SELECT p.metric_name, b.execution_time, t.start_date FROM performance_metrics p JOIN benchmarking_results b ON p.id = b.metric_id JOIN time_periods t ON b.time_period_id = t.time_period_id ORDER BY b.execution_time DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT c.comparison_id, m1.metric_name AS metric1_name, m2.metric_name AS metric2_name, c.comparison_result FROM comparisons c JOIN performance_metrics m1 ON c.metric_id_1 = m1.id JOIN performance_metrics m2 ON c.metric_id_2 = m2.id WHERE c.comparison_result = 'Positive' ORDER BY c.comparison_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT benchmark_name, benchmark_score FROM benchmark_results WHERE benchmark_score < 50;
SELECT time_start, time_end FROM time_periods WHERE time_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_type = 'SQL';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Usage';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.9 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM benchmark_results WHERE benchmark_score >= 90 AND benchmark_score < 95 ORDER BY benchmark_score ASC, result_id DESC;

SELECT comparison_id, metric_name, benchmark_name, time_period FROM comparison_metrics JOIN performance_metrics ON comparison_metrics.metric_id = performance_metrics.metric_id JOIN benchmark_results ON comparison_metrics.result_id = benchmark_results.result_id;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type, data_source_description FROM data_sources WHERE data_source_type = 'Database' ORDER BY data_source_name ASC;
